description: This Italian style plant based stew is hearty and filling with vegan sausages and butterbeans.
name: Italian Sausage Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour over the chopped tomatoes and butter beans and stir in the olives. Simmer for 15 minutes until the vegetables and sausages are tender.
